column4: Could someone help me configure my network on Edgy with a LAN connection?
Could someone help me configure my network on Edgy with a LAN connection?
Could someone help me configure my network on Edgy with a LAN connection?
Id like to get that computer connected to the Net
Ubuntu detected my network card and says that it's connected
but it wont go to any pages in Firefox
system > administration > networking
do you have a DHCP server on your network?
may I query?
no, keep it in chan i am not actually that smart, other ppl will help
so the card is seen by the kernel and it's "up" ?
do you have a router or firewall between you and the internet?
can you ping 64.233.161.99
it's not connected right now
trying to figure out if it's a DNS or a connection prob
you can connect to repos?
so next time you are on linux, try to ping 64.233.161.99
my IP changes everytime it connect
that will determine if it's DNS or IP
your DNS addresses are always the same, they're your ISP's  yes dns server are necessary
yes, you will needat least 1 dns server address in your network config
write down the ones you're using in windows and use those on linux also
i don't use windows ;]   i think in the control panel, network, ethernet properties or something.
it's  sudo oem-config-prepare   (no - after sudo)
